short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JIRA browser extension to provides useful tools to manage your dashboards and direct links to your most used JIRA dashboards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JIRA browser extension to provides useful tools to manage your dashboards and direct links to your most used JIRA dashboards, such as your current sprint, backlog and quickly access any issue.
